title: The People's Choice for Favorite New TV Drama is Person of Interest | E! People's Choice Awards
author: E! Red Carpet & Award Shows
comment: Well done to the whole 'Person of Interest' production team!  You produce a high-quality, well-crafted program and the fans appreciate it.  Thank you!!
OMG person of interest totally deserves this award. Especially Jim Caviezel. My angel.
Hell yeah... definately the best new show... LOVE Person of Interest :D YAY!
No show deserves it more! Kudos POI team!
description:
Angus T. Jones and Pauley Perrette accept the trophy on behalf of the cast of Person of Interest at People's Choice Awards 2012
